column1: in memory of lessie burke -- hightower family funeral homes| first: last: lessie burke february 23
column11: the daughter of the late turner burke and the late darnella miller burke. she worked at scripto for many years and was a methodist by faith. in addition to her parents
column12: she was also preceded in death by her siblings: mr. willie burke
column14: and mr. marion burke. she is survived by her sisters
column15: mrs. fannie burke owens of kennesaw
column16: georgia and mrs. helen lee sanders of bainbridge
column19: and cousins. graveside services will be held at 11:00 a. m. on friday
column23: with pastor bernard burke officiating. interment will follow in the west georgia memorial park. the family will receive friends at the funeral home on friday
column25: 2015 from 9:30 10:30 a. m. you may share your thoughts and condolences online at www. hightowersmemorial. comhightowers memorial chapel of douglasville has charge of the arrangements. 770-489-2818
